title: About Me
text:
Hi there! My name is Denis Abdullin and I am a Data Science Manager at Johnson & Johnson. I started my journey in Data Science in 2016 after a couple of years in master data and process automation. I created multiple internal packages helping data and business professionals to get insights from data.
My passion is building tools for automated data analysis, natural language generation systems, time series forecasting, building shiny modules and applications. I mostly code in R, but can also handle Python.
Here are some examples of my work:

narrator - template-based NLG system in R
async shiny application using promises

title: About Me
text:
